name: ICDeviceBrowserDelegate
desc: Methods for managing the addition and removal of devices and responding to device changes.

items.name: func deviceBrowser(ICDeviceBrowser, didAdd: ICDevice, moreComing: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a device has been added.

items.name: func deviceBrowser(ICDeviceBrowser, didRemove: ICDevice, moreGoing: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a device has been removed.

items.name: func deviceBrowserDidEnumerateLocalDevices(ICDeviceBrowser)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the device browser has completed sending deviceBrowser(_:didAdd:moreComing:) for all local devices.

items.name: func deviceBrowser(ICDeviceBrowser, requestsSelect: ICDevice)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when an event occurs on the device that may be of interest to the client application.

items.name: func deviceBrowser(ICDeviceBrowser, deviceDidChangeName: ICDevice)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the name of a device changes.

items.name: func deviceBrowser(ICDeviceBrowser, deviceDidChangeSharingState: ICDevice)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the sharing state of a device changes.
